name: Apple MacBook Pro
description: The Apple MacBook Pro offers powerful performance, a high-resolution display, and an elegant design, making it ideal for professional use.

name: Dell XPS 13
description: The Dell XPS 13 features a slim and lightweight design, a borderless display, and excellent battery life.

name: HP Spectre x360
description: The HP Spectre x360 combines a convertible design, powerful performance, and a vivid touchscreen display.

name: Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Carbon
description: The Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Carbon is a business-class laptop with a durable build, impressive performance, and a comfortable keyboard.

name: ASUS ROG Zephyrus G14
description: The ASUS ROG Zephyrus G14 is a gaming laptop with a powerful processor, dedicated graphics, and a high-refresh-rate display.

name: Microsoft Surface Laptop 4
description: The Microsoft Surface Laptop 4 offers a sleek design, smooth performance, and a vibrant PixelSense touchscreen display.

name: Acer Swift 3
description: The Acer Swift 3 is a budget-friendly laptop with a lightweight design, long battery life, and decent performance.

name: Razer Blade 15
description: The Razer Blade 15 is a gaming laptop with a sleek aluminum chassis, powerful graphics, and a high-refresh-rate display.

name: LG Gram 17
description: The LG Gram 17 is an ultralight laptop with a large display, long battery life, and solid performance.

name: Alienware m15 R4
description: The Alienware m15 R4 is a high-performance gaming laptop with top-of-the-line specifications and immersive graphics.
